item.title: 全球经济下滑，燃料零售商安波尔第一季度炼油利润减半
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的燃料零售商安波尔公司（Ampol）周三报告称，其位于昆士兰州的莱顿炼油厂第一季度炼油利润率下降了 49%，原因是亚洲的风向标--新加坡的炼油利润疲软。【原文：Australia's top fuel retailer Ampol reported a 49% drop in first-quarter refining margins for its Lytton refinery in Queensland on Wednesday, citing weakness in refining profits in Singapore — a bellwether for Asia.】

item.title: 日本 2 月机械订单月率增长 4.3
item.description: 日本政府周三公布的数据显示，日本 2 月份核心机械订单环比增长 4.3%。【原文：Japan's core machinery orders rose 4.3% in February from the previous month, government data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 加州总检察长拒绝加入马斯克对 OpenAI 的诉讼
item.description: 加利福尼亚州总检察长办公室在周二公开的一封信中拒绝加入埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对 OpenAI 提起的诉讼，称总检察长办公室认为马斯克的行为不符合该州的公共利益。【原文：The California attorney general's office declined to join a lawsuit by Elon Musk against OpenAI, the agency wrote in a letter made public on Tuesday, saying that the office did not see how Musk's action serves the public interest of the state.】

item.title: 中国第一季度经济增长可能放缓，关税令前景黯淡
item.description: 在房地产长期低迷的情况下，中国第一季度的经济增速预计将有所放缓，决策者们正在为美国巨额关税的影响做准备，分析人士称，美国关税对这个亚洲强国构成了数十年来最大的风险。【原文：China's economy is expected to have slowed in the first quarter in the face of a prolonged property downturn, as policymakers brace for the impact of hefty U.S. tariffs that analysts say pose the biggest risk to the Asian powerhouse in decades.】

item.title: 中国就如何处理加密货币犯罪缓存展开辩论
item.description: 中国从非法交易中查获的加密货币越来越多，这促使地方政府想方设法处理这些囤积的加密货币，也刺激了法院和金融业要求加强监管的呼声。【原文：China's growing pile of cryptocurrencies seized from illegal transactions is prompting local governments to find ways to dispose of the hoard and spurring calls from courts and the financial industry for better regulation.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税影响，日本制造商对商业前景转为谨慎：路透社民调
item.description: 路透社 Tankan 民意调查显示，日本制造商 4 月份的商业景气较 3 月份有所改善，但由于要应对美国全面进口关税的影响，他们对未来三个月的前景持悲观态度。【原文：Japanese manufacturers expressed improved business sentiment in April versus March though are bearish about their outlook over the next three months as they brace for the impact of sweeping U.S. import tariffs, a Reuters Tankan poll found.】

item.title: 管理者称，美国对关键网络漏洞数据库的资助即将耗尽
item.description: 以国防和研究为重点的非营利性机构 MITRE 公司称，美国政府对该公司维护全球安全研究人员和数字防御人员使用的重要网络漏洞数据库的资助将于周三用完。【原文：The defense and research-focused nonprofit MITRE Corporation says funding from the U.S. government runs out on Wednesday for it to maintain a critical database of cyber vulnerabilities used by security researchers and digital defenders the world over.】

item.title: OpenAI 任命其非营利委员会成员
item.description: 聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 周二任命了新成立的非营利委员会成员，该委员会将指导公司的慈善工作。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI named members to its newly formed nonprofit commission on Tuesday, which will guide the company's philanthropic efforts.】

item.title: 美国财政部长：尽管债券市场动荡不安，但中国不存在将国债武器化的风险
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二在接受雅虎财经（Yahoo Finance）采访时驳斥了有关中国不顾债券市场波动而将其国债武器化的担忧，并补充说中国不存在利用其雄厚的国债储备给美国经济造成痛苦的潜在风险。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent in an interview with Yahoo Finance on Tuesday dismissed concerns over China weaponizing its Treasuries despite bond market volatility and added there was no risk of China potentially using its robust Treasury pile to inflict economic pain on the United States.】

item.title: 巴西淡水河谷第一季度铁矿石产量下降 4.5%
item.description: 巴西矿业公司淡水河谷周二在其销售和产量报告中称，2025 年第一季度生产了 6770 万公吨铁，比去年同期下降了 4.5%。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale produced 67.7 million metric tons of iron in the first quarter of 2025, down 4.5% from a year earlier, the company reported on Tuesday in its sales and output report.】

item.title: 力拓铁矿石发货量因飓风袭击皮尔巴拉运营中心而下降
item.description: 力拓公司（Rio Tinto）周三报告称，第一季度铁矿石发货量下降了 9%，由于热带气旋袭击了澳大利亚西海岸并扰乱了运营，目前预计 2025 年皮尔巴拉地区的发货量将低于预期。【原文：Rio Tinto , reported a 9% drop in first-quarter iron ore shipments on Wednesday, with 2025 Pilbara shipments now expected at the lower end of guidance after tropical cyclones battered Australia's west coast and disrupted operations.】

item.title: 产经新闻》报道：日本央行上田表示，如果美国关税损害经济，央行可能需要采取应对措施
item.description: 据日本《产经新闻》周三报道，日本央行行长上田一夫表示，如果美国关税损害日本经济，央行可能需要采取政策行动。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said the central bank may need to take policy action if U.S. tariffs hurt the Japanese economy, the Sankei newspaper reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 帖子称声名狼藉的互联网留言板 4chan 遭黑客攻击
item.description: 据网上流传的帖子称，臭名昭著的互联网留言板 4chan 已被黑客入侵，其中一些帖子称，一名涉案黑客向公众透露了该网站版主的身份信息。【原文：The notorious internet messageboard 4chan has been hacked, according to posts circulating online, some of which said that a the hacker involved had revealed identifying details of the site's moderators to the public.】

item.title: 特朗普签署命令，启动对依赖进口关键矿物的调查
item.description: 美国白宫周二表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普签署了一项行政命令，对美国依赖进口加工关键矿物的国家安全风险展开调查。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order launching an investigation into the national security risks of the country's reliance on imported processed critical minerals, the White House said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 根据破产计划，Forever 21 债权人面临巨额损失
item.description: Forever 21 公司无担保债权人的一位律师周二表示，根据一项重组计划，该公司的供应商、供应商和其他无担保债权人将 "被熏死"，该计划设想对这家破产的快速时尚零售商所欠债务进行微不足道的追偿。【原文：Suppliers, vendors and other unsecured creditors of Forever 21 are "getting smoked" under a restructuring plan that envisions paltry recoveries on debts owed by the bankrupt fast fashion retailer, a lawyer for the company's unsecured creditors said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 受经济不确定性影响，广告公司 Omnicom 收入不及预期
item.description: 广告公司宏盟集团（Omnicom Group）周二未能达到华尔街对其第一季度收入的预期，经济环境的不确定性对其多个业务部门造成了影响，导致其股价在盘后交易中下跌了 3.6%。【原文：Advertising firm Omnicom Group missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter revenue on Tuesday, as an uncertain economic environment weighed on several of its segments, sending its shares down 3.6% in trading after the bell.】

item.title: 独家报道业内人士估计，美国关税可能使芯片设备制造商损失超过 10 亿美元
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，根据上周在华盛顿与官员和立法者讨论的行业计算结果，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的新关税可能会使美国半导体设备制造商每年损失超过 10 亿美元。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's new tariffs could cost U.S. semiconductor equipment makers more than $1 billion a year, according to industry calculations discussed with officials and lawmakers in Washington last week, two sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国管制 H20 芯片在华销售，英伟达销售额最高将受 55 亿美元冲击
item.description: Nvidia 周二表示，在美国政府表示将要求向中国出口其 H20 微芯片（该芯片一直是 Nvidia 最受欢迎的芯片之一）的许可后，Nvidia 将承担 55 亿美元的费用。【原文：Nvidia on Tuesday said it would take $5.5 billion in charges after the U.S. government said it would require licenses for exports to China of its H20 microchip, which has been one of its most popular chips.】

item.title: 新西兰航空公司预计 2025 年盈利下降，原因是发动机故障
item.description: 新西兰航空公司（Air New Zealand）周三表示，预计 2025 财年的收益将有所下降，原因是全球发动机维修延迟和相关赔偿水平存在不确定性。【原文：Air New Zealand said on Wednesday it expects lower earnings in the 2025 financial year, citing uncertainty regarding its global engine maintenance delays and related compensation levels.】

item.title: 交易日：再次陷入低迷，但烟花即将绽放
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: Figma 秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 基于云计算的设计师平台 Figma 周二提交了在美国首次公开募股的申请，在此之前一年多，该公司以 200 亿美元被 Adobe 收购的交易曾遭遇监管障碍。【原文：Cloud-based designer platform Figma on Tuesday filed for an initial public offering in the United States, over a year after its $20 billion deal to be acquired by Adobe hit regulatory roadblocks.】

item.title: 西班牙部长会见贝森特后对 "公平 "的美欧贸易协定表示乐观
item.description: 西班牙经济部长卡洛斯-奎尔波（Carlos Cuerpo）周二在华盛顿会见美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）后表示，他相信美国和欧盟将通过谈判达成一项公平的贸易协议。【原文：Spanish Economy Minister Carlos Cuerpo said on Tuesday he was convinced the United States and European Union would negotiate a fair trade deal after meeting with U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent in Washington.】

item.title: 独家报道如果延长出口减税政策，阿根廷小麦大丰收将创纪录
item.description: 阿根廷主要的布宜诺斯艾利斯谷物交易所首席经济学家周二告诉路透社，该机构已经预测小麦将获得大丰收，如果临时出口税减免政策延长至 6 月底，该机构可能会进一步提高预期。【原文：Argentina's major Buenos Aires grains exchange, already forecasting a bumper wheat crop, could raise its estimates even higher if a temporary export tax cut until the end of June is extended, the body's chief economist told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司警告称，如果美国经济衰退，将面临利润风险
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）周二预测本季度利润低于预期，并警告说如果美国经济陷入衰退，全年前景将面临下行风险。【原文：United Airlines on Tuesday forecast a lower-than-expected profit for the current quarter and warned of downside risks to its full-year outlook if the U.S. economy slips into a recession.】

item.title: Venture Global 液化天然气公司卡尔卡西厄通道工厂开始商业运营
item.description: Venture Global 液化天然气公司周二表示，该公司位于路易斯安那州的 Calcasieu Pass 工厂已开始商业运营，结束了为期三年多的调试过程。【原文：Venture Global LNG has begun commercial operations at its Calcasieu Pass plant in Louisiana, ending a more than a three-year commissioning process at the plant, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 债券策略师预计，尽管关税动荡，美国收益率仍将下降
item.description: 路透社调查的债券策略师称，唐纳德-特朗普总统对贸易伙伴征收反复无常的全面关税后，经济放缓将最终迫使美联储降低利率，美国国债收益率将下降。【原文：U.S. Treasury yields will fall, according to bond strategists polled by Reuters who say an economic slowdown in the wake of President Donald Trump's erratic and sweeping tariffs on trading partners will eventually compel the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 欧洲制药公司在美国预期加征关税前发出留在欧盟的要求
item.description: 据法国商业报纸《回声报》周二报道，近三十家全球制药公司在致欧盟委员会主席的一封信中要求，尽管美国威胁要对进口产品征收关税，但仍应帮助它们维持在欧盟的运营，包括采取措施补偿它们的医药创新成本。【原文：Nearly three dozen global pharmaceutical companies, in a letter to the head of the European Commission, demanded help to maintain operations in the EU despite threatened U.S. tariffs on imports, including measures to compensate them for the cost of pharmaceutical innovations, French business newspaper Les Echos reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称 KKR 接近收购德国 IT 服务公司 Datagroup
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周二告诉路透社，私募股权公司 KKR 接近收购在法兰克福上市的 IT 服务提供商 Datagroup。【原文：Private equity firm KKR is close to acquiring Frankfurt-listed IT services provider Datagroup , people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西汽车市场为美国关税政策敲响警钟
item.description: 十多年前，当巴西提高汽车市场的贸易壁垒时，政府曾承诺增加本地制造业、提供可靠的工作岗位和更好的汽车。【原文：When Brazil hiked trade barriers in its auto market over a decade ago, the government promised more local manufacturing, reliable jobs and better cars.】

item.title: 天空新闻》称，英国 Playtech 公司将任命前 DAZN 高管 Gleasure 担任董事长
item.description: 据天空新闻周二报道，英国博彩技术公司 Playtech 将任命 DAZN 前高管 John Gleasure 为下一任董事长。【原文：British gambling technology firm Playtech is set to name former DAZN executive John Gleasure as its next chairman, Sky News reported on Tuesday.】
